Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will take place at Citizens Bank Park.
The Phillies rank ninth-best in MLB play with 163 total home runs.
The Braves rank fourth in Major League Baseball with 179 home runs.
Philadelphia's.257 batting average is fourth-best in MLB.
Atlanta ranks 16th in MLB with a.242 team batting average.
The Phillies score the ninth-most runs in baseball (656 total, 4.8 per game).
The Braves have scored 587 runs (4.3 per game) this season, which ranks 17th in MLB.
Others: Aaron Nola (RHP) will be the starting pitcher for the Phillies, and Spencer Schwellenbach (RHP) will be the starting pitcher for the Braves.
Alec Bohm, Bryce Harper, Kyle Schwarber, Nicholas Castellanos, and Trea Turner are hitters to watch in the Phillies vs. Braves game.
Marcell Ozuna, Matt Olson, Jorge Soler, Orlando Arcia, and Travis d'Arnaud are hitters to watch in the Braves vs. Phillies game.
The game can be streamed on Fubo and watched on ESPN.
